amendment.description: To require a report on the plan for the United States nuclear weapons stockpile, nuclear weapons complex, and delivery platforms, and to express the sense of the Senate on follow-on negotiations to the START Treaty.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1807 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1807 proposed by Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 1760. (consideration: CR S8003; text: CR S8003) To require a report on the plan for the United States nuclear weapons stockpile, nuclear weapons complex, and delivery platforms, and to express the sense of the Senate on follow-on negotiations to the START Treaty.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1807 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1807 proposed by Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 1760.
